title: TCS completes two decades of public listing
description: TCS CEO K Krithivasan said on LinkedIn that IT major has reshaped the global IT industry in these two decades. He also thanked employees of TCS, along with clients and partners. The public listing of the Tata group subsidiary happened on 25 August 2004 with TCS shares had listed at a premium of over 26.6% at Rs 1,076 apiece on the BSE.
content: India’s largest IT giant Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) has marked 20 years of its public listing on the two key Indian bourses — the BSE and the National Stock Exchange (NSE).
cleaned_content: india s largest it giant tata consultancy services tcs has marked <TWO_TEN> years of its public listing on the two key indian bourses the bse and the national stock exchange nse
